job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtWho We AreltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSame Seats Better PricesltbrgtltbrgtAmong the fastest growing technology companies TickPick is reshaping the secondary ticket marketplace putting money back in the wallets of live eventgoers Since inception we have saved our customers over 55 million in service fees Our BestPrice Guarantee backs up our promise to deliver better prices than our competitionltbrgtltbrgtFor the last five years TickPick has been named a Deloitte Technology Fast 500 award winner and has landed on lists of Inc 5000s and Crains New York Business Fast 50ltbrgtltbrgtIf you are passionate about concerts sports theater or all of them and want to see your skills and experience have a direct impact on a fast growing company TickPick is the place for you We are building a diverse team committed to providing the most innovative transparent and costeffective ticket marketplace in the industryltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWho You AreltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWe are looking for a FrontEnd Software Engineer who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design You will work alongside back end developers and user experience designers to bring the product to life You will ensure that the site is optimized and running efficiently paying special attention to SEOltbrgtltbrgtYou work well crossfunctionally and you are a trusted and respected member of the team Comfortable working in ambiguously defined problem spaces you are a curious and creative problem solver delivering tangible resultsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDevelop new userfacing features on web and mobile ltligtltligtEnsure the technical feasibility of UIUX designs ltligtltligtEnsure web design is optimized for smartphones ltligtltligtBuild reusable code for future use ltligtltligtOptimize web pages for maximum speed and scalability ltligtltligtCollaborate with other team members and conduct code reviews ltligtltligtTechnologies youll use NodeJS React React Native Express Webpack JQuery MustacheltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDegree in computer science or related field ltligtltligtProficiency in HTML CSS JavaScript ltligtltligtUnderstanding of modern frontend frameworks ltligtltligtExperience with mobile developement ltligtltligtExperience with responsive and adaptive design ltligtltligtUnderstanding of SEO principles ltligtltligtExperience with Agile Software Development methodologies ltligtltligtGood problemsolving skills ltligtltligtExcellent verbal communication skills ltligtltligtGood interpersonal skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtDiversity at TickPick ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt TickPick we know that diversity of all types in an environment that pursues equity and inclusion strengthens our organizations culture When our employees are representative of the communities we serve with diversity in demographics and a broad set of backgrounds we provide a superior experience for both our customers and our employees Fostering an open and supportive environment where our employees are empowered and encouraged to bring their whole selves to the table enables TickPick to thrive The diverse approaches and collaborative problem solving that result enable us to provide an innovative nimble and creative marketplace for our customers and sellers This belief is central to who we are and what we do and we are proud of itltbrgtltbrgtTickPick LLC is proud to be an equal opportunity employer open to all qualified candidates regardless of race color religion national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age mental or physical disability marital status citizenship status military status protected veteran status or any other category protected by
